definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: To look at ourselves in the mirror often will be very beneficial.
sentences.chinese: 經常照鏡自省將讓我們受益匪淺。

sentences.english: Undoubtly, college students have benefited a lot from social practice.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，大學生從社會實踐中已經受益匪淺。

sentences.english: ACED: What is the most rewarding experience you have had during your career?
sentences.chinese: 在你的事業生涯裏，有過什麼讓你受益匪淺的經歷呢？

sentences.english: I have benefited a lot from reading.
sentences.chinese: 廣坊蹬漳讀使我受益匪淺。

sentences.english: Perhaps the brutalised country he has done so much to impoverish might even benefit too.
sentences.chinese: 也許遭受他殘酷統治的國家也會受益匪淺。

sentences.english: All of us benefit greatly from this surge of human energy and aptitude.
sentences.chinese: 這些人才的熱情和才能的爆發令我們受益匪淺。

sentences.english: Vivi: So that is how it is. I benefited much from today’s talk.
sentences.chinese: 原來如此，今天的談話真是讓我受益匪淺。

sentences.english: Thank you for living a life so bold and teaching us so many lessons along the way.
sentences.chinese: 感謝你如此英勇地活過這令我們受益匪淺的一生。

sentences.english: After all, Spitzer had graduated from his role as prosecutor.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，斯皮策的檢察官職位使他受益匪淺。

sentences.english: I enjoyed the great benefit of his instructions concerning the matter.
sentences.chinese: 在這個問題上他的指教使我受益匪淺。

sentences.english: I found much of my laboratory training at RIT to be extremely rewarding.
sentences.chinese: 我發現自己的實驗室經驗讓我受益匪淺。

sentences.english: I enjoyed the great benefit of his instructions concerning the matter.
sentences.chinese: 在這一問題上他的指教使我受益匪淺。

sentences.english: Breaking the habit of self-criticism can pay big dividends in mental and physical health.
sentences.chinese: 克服自責的習慣可以令你的身心都受益匪淺。
你的思想也將受益匪淺。

sentences.english: Trip to the Labor Technology Center, we benefit.
sentences.chinese: 這次來勞技中心，我們受益匪淺。
